meanings.definition: An inscription or drawing made on a wall or surface.
meanings.sent1: The graffiti on the wall was colorful and eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: I saw some graffiti on the subway train this morning.
meanings.sent3: The graffiti on the bathroom stall had a funny cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: Her notebook was filled with graffiti of her favorite quotes.
meanings.sent5: The graffiti of a heart symbol was etched into the tree trunk.

meanings.sent1: There were many graffito on the walls of the old building.
meanings.sent2: The graffito in the alley were all different colors.
meanings.sent3: The graffito in the park seemed to be having a conversation.
meanings.sent4: The graffito in the museum told stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: Each graffito on the street corner had a unique style.
